import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Col } from 'reactstrap' import { cartActions } from '../../redux/slices/cartSlice' import '../../styles/product-card.css' const ProductCard = ({item}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const addToCart = () => { dispatch(cartActions.addItem({ id: item.id, productName: item.productName, price: item.price, image: item.imgUrl, })) alert('Item has been added to cart') }; return (

{item.productName}

{item.category}
Â£{item.price}
) } export default ProductCard
